Class Shape

java.lang.Object
Shape
public class Shape extends Object
Author:
Drumstyle92 Class containing two variables and constructors with variables and parameters to indicate geometric shapes.

  • Field Details

    • shapeName

      public String shapeName
      variable indicating the shape.

    • numberOfEdges

      public int numberOfEdges

  • Constructor Details

    • Shape

      public Shape()
      constructor for an indefinite form.

    • Shape

      public Shape(double radius)
      Parameters:
      radius - parameter indicating the radius of the shape. constructor for the circle shape.

    • Shape

      public Shape(int edges, double edgeLength)
      Parameters:
      edges - parameter that indicates the edges of the shape.
      edgeLength - edge length parameter. constructor for the square shape.

    • Shape

      public Shape(double e1, double e2)
      Parameters:
      e1 - parameter with the length of the base.
      e2 - parameter with the length of the height. constructor for the rectangular shape.

    • Shape

      public Shape(double e1, double e2, double e3)
      Parameters:
      e1 - parameter indicating the length of the border 1.
      e2 - parameter indicating the length of the border 2.
      e3 - parameter indicating the length of the border 3. constructor for the triangular shape.

  • Method Details

    • getShapeDetails

      public void getShapeDetails()
      method that displays both the name of the shape and the number of edges it has.
